name: Seafood
description: Dishes featuring fish, shellfish, and other seafood, prepared in various styles like grilling, baking, or frying.

name: Lamb
description: Recipes featuring lamb, including roasts, chops, and stews, known for its distinct flavor.

name: Starter
description: Small dishes served before the main course, such as appetizers, soups, or small bites.

name: Chicken
description: Dishes centered around chicken, prepared through grilling, roasting, frying, or other cooking methods.

name: Beef
description: Recipes featuring beef as the primary ingredient, including steaks, roasts, and ground beef dishes.

name: Dessert
description: Sweet dishes typically served at the end of a meal, including cakes, pastries, ice creams, and other confections.

name: Vegan
description: Plant-based recipes that exclude all animal products, including meat, dairy, and eggs.

name: Pork
description: Recipes that use pork as the main ingredient, including chops, ribs, and pulled pork dishes.

name: Vegetarian
description: Recipes that exclude meat and fish, focusing on vegetables, grains, legumes, and other plant-based ingredients.

name: Miscellaneous
description: A variety of recipes that don't fit into specific categories, including unique or experimental dishes.

name: Pasta
description: Dishes centered around pasta, paired with sauces, meats, vegetables, or cheeses.

name: Breakfast
description: Recipes for morning meals, including eggs, pancakes, oatmeal, and other breakfast staples.

name: Side
description: Complementary dishes served alongside main courses, such as salads, vegetables, or starches.

name: Goat
description: Recipes featuring goat meat, often used in stews, curries, or grilled dishes.

name: Soup
description: Liquid-based dishes, often served warm or cold, featuring broths, vegetables, or meats.
